name: spotilist
description: Spotilist is a Streamlit-based Python application designed to export your Spotify playlists into CSV files. It automatically fetches track metadata (artists, album, release date, etc.) and packages everything into a convenient downloadable ZIP file.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist build release executables/linux/spotilist_backend executables/mac/spotilist_backend executables/win/spotilist_backend.exe
scripts.python:linux: pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --windowed --name "spotilist_backend" --distpath "./executables/linux" --workpath "./build" --collect-all streamlit --collect-all spotipy --collect-all pandas --collect-all altair --add-data "app/script.py:." app/run.py
scripts.python:mac:intel: pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --console --name "spotilist_backend" --distpath "./executables/mac-intel" --workpath "./build-intel" --collect-all streamlit --collect-all spotipy --collect-all pandas --collect-all altair --add-data "app/script.py:." app/run.py
scripts.python:mac:arm: pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --console --name "spotilist_backend" --distpath "./executables/mac-arm" --workpath "./build-arm" --collect-all streamlit --collect-all spotipy --collect-all pandas --collect-all altair --add-data "app/script.py:." app/run.py
scripts.python:win: pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --windowed --name "spotilist_backend" --distpath "./executables/win" --workpath "./build" --collect-all streamlit --collect-all spotipy --collect-all pandas --collect-all altair --add-data "app/script.py;." app/run.py
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && npm run python:linux && npm run electron:linux
scripts.build:mac:intel: npm run clean && npm run python:mac:intel && npm run electron:mac:intel
scripts.build:mac:arm: npm run clean && npm run python:mac:arm && npm run electron:mac:arm
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && npm run python:win && npm run electron:win
